title: Spirit always Knows! True stories of life as a Psychic Intuitive Medium- with Angela

json.text: One of the things I've learned over the years is that spirit always knows. Now as
a reader, I may not always understand the message that's coming across, and I often
have to describe things to a client and talk about it and get them to confirm it
or get them to understand something for me to really truly understand it. That's
the nature of the job.
So an example of when spirit knows and we're not always getting the message
happened the other day. A young client was sitting down with me, and I was
talking to him about things that I see for his life and behind him was what I
would call a two removed, that's how I see it as two removed
Uncle energy. And it was quite strong so I focused in on this Uncle energy- and
when I did the Uncle was saying to me, to pass along the message to this young man.
That he was with him to help guide him, but he also was telling him not to do
what I have done. And so when I passed along this information to this client -he
was bewildered. He actually didn't understand what I was trying to say. And
so what I then do is I'll try to do some 'Wow's' or 'tells' as I call them and that's
where I focus in on the energy and I start to describe the person. It can be
details about their life, it can be little idiosyncrasies that they have, it
can be their physical self, and I try to make a connection so that the client
understands who I'm speaking of so they get the message. And for this particular
gentleman I was able to get that his height was as tall as the gentleman
sitting in front of me but except for a little bit taller ,I got an image of him
smoking but that he had quit, I got a few other personal details that I can't
share with you at this moment. And the young gentleman was again confused! And I
was trying to continue but I couldn't get across a connection with my client.
So he confessed to me that his family isn't overly close and I said "Oh okay!
all right" so I said "You're not relating to the information that's coming up?" he
said" Well, I am except for my uncle that I can think of -he is alive!" and he said to
me "You know are you sure this isn't my uncle who's alive? And why would he be
saying to me don't do what I did?" and I said "W,hy I'm not sure about that, I'm just
the in-between. I pass along the message- but I can guarantee you that
this gentleman is absolutely passed on." And still the confusion was there, and so I
said to him" I'll tell you what. Go home, talk to your mom.She knows the family
history?" he said" Yeah! A lot better than I do!" I said "Okay,
go home talk to your mom find out from her what uncle's this may be and then
when you come back and see me, let me know and then we'll figure it out from
there." And so sure enough a week passed and I come back to the place I'm doing
mini readings from and he's waiting for me at the door. And we sit down together
and he let me know that he did talk to his mom and that the uncle that he had
been thinking about who matched the description had actually committed
suicide two weeks earlier. Now the beauty in this moment- as sad as suicide can be-
is that this gentleman now knows that his relative is with him. To move forward
with, to heal with, and to make sure he didn't do what the gentleman who had
passed on did. What a beautiful healing message. What a beautiful job I have -to
be able to pass that along even if it is a sad circumstance. But in the end Spirit
always knows even when myself as a reader can't
totally make sense of it nor can the client.
you
